games.summary: Donovan Mitchell scored 28 points and the Cleveland Cavaliers took control in the second half for a 146-134 victory over Minnesota on Saturday that snapped the Timberwolves' four-game winning streak. Evan Mobley had 24 points, Jaylon Tyson scored 23 off the bench and Darius Garland added 22.

Andrew Nembhard had 29 points and nine assists, Aaron Nesmith added 12 points and nine rebounds before an early exit and the Indiana Pacers routed the Miami Heat 123-99 on Saturday night. Indiana matched its longest winning streak of the season with a rare second straight victory, this time taking the easy route.

Kawhi Leonard scored 26 points and John Collins added 25 as the Los Angeles Clippers rallied to beat the short-handed Detroit Pistons 98-92 on Saturday. Ron Holland II scored 16 and Tolu Smith added nine points and a career-high 14 rebounds.
blurbs: ⬆️ Paul Reed (DET) played 22 min (season avg: 12). 8 pts, 7 reb, 3 ast.
📋 Javonte Green (DET) made just his 4th start this season. 7 pts, 7 reb.
📋 Jaden Ivey (DET) made just his 2nd start this season. 8 pts, 3 reb.
⬆️ Jordan Miller (LAC) played 28 min (season avg: 13). 9 pts, 1 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Victor Wembanyama scored 16 of his 21 points in the second half, including a game-sealing jumper with 19.2 seconds left, and the San Antonio Spurs beat the Boston Celtics 100-95 on Saturday night. Derrick White led Boston with 29 points and Jaylen Brown had 27.
blurbs: 📋 Hugo Gonzalez (BOS) made just his 2nd start this season. 0 pts, 4 reb.
⬆️ Baylor Scheierman (BOS) played 26 min (season avg: 11). 10 pts, 2 reb, 0 ast.

games.summary: Coby White scored 22 points, Ayo Dosunmu had 20 and the Chicago Bulls beat the Dallas Mavericks 125-107 on Saturday night to snap a three-game losing streak. The Bulls put seven players in double figures, outscored the Mavericks 38-8 in fast-break points and never trailed.
blurbs: ⬆️ Caleb Martin (DAL) played 20 min (season avg: 10). 8 pts, 4 reb, 4 ast.

games.summary: Brandon Miller scored 18 points, LaMelo Ball had 17 and the Charlotte Hornets built a 47-point lead in the first half of a 150-95 rout against the Utah Jazz on Saturday night. Ryan Kalbrenner and Grant Williams returned from injuries for Charlotte, which outscored Utah by 45 points behind the 3-point line in the first half.
blurbs: 📋 Kevin Love (UTAH) made just his 4th start this season. 2 pts, 5 reb.
⬆️ Taylor Hendricks (UTAH) played 29 min (season avg: 15). 7 pts, 4 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Cody Williams (UTAH) made just his 2nd start this season. 15 pts, 2 reb.
⬆️ Walter Clayton Jr. (UTAH) played 30 min (season avg: 17). 13 pts, 0 reb, 4 ast.
